name: Day of Destiny
oracle_text: Legendary creatures you control get +2/+2.
flavor_text:
"Rise like the sun, stand like the mountain, charge like the lion, die as a hero."
—General Takeno

name: Empty-Shrine Kannushi
oracle_text: Empty-Shrine Kannushi has protection from the colors of permanents you control.
flavor_text: "Crease the folds, bend the paper, turn the spirits, shield the soul."

name: Faithful Squire
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Faithful Squire.
At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Faithful Squire, you may flip it.

name: Kaiso, Memory of Loyalty
oracle_text: Flying
Remove a ki counter from Kaiso, Memory of Loyalty: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

name: Final Judgment
oracle_text: Exile all creatures.
flavor_text:
"The clashing warriors turned to face O-Kagachi, the greatest kami, and their sigh of awe was their last breath."
—Great Battles of Kamigawa

name: Genju of the Fields
oracle_text: Enchant Plains
{2}: Until end of turn, enchanted Plains becomes a 2/5 white Spirit creature with "Whenever this creature deals damage, its controller gains that much life." It's still a land.
When enchanted Plains is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Fields from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Heart of Light
oracle_text: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"There is a shining in the mortal heart that even the kami cannot reach."
—Sensei Golden-Tail

name: Hokori, Dust Drinker
oracle_text: Lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a land he or she controls.

name: Hundred-Talon Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

Splice onto Arcane—Tap an untapped white creature you control. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Indebted Samurai
oracle_text: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a Samurai you control dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Indebted Samurai.
flavor_text: "Forgive me, Saburo. I could not save you. But your blade will not rest in my hand."

name: Kami of False Hope
oracle_text: Sacrifice Kami of False Hope: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"Across the rift of battle, a bridge of gossamer. And for one moment, it holds."
—Snow-Fur, kitsune poet

name: Kami of Tattered Shoji
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, Kami of Tattered Shoji gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: It remembered all the shadows lantern-cast upon its paper wings, and sometimes those silhouettes played across its shape again, acting out silent tragedies.

name: Kami of the Honored Dead
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Kami of the Honored Dead is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
Soulshift 6 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 6 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Kentaro, the Smiling Cat
oracle_text: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
You may pay {X} rather than pay the mana cost for Samurai spells you cast, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor_text: "The bonds of bushido will draw the dishonored back someday, and I will be there waiting."

name: Kitsune Palliator
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to each creature and each player this turn.
flavor_text: "Who am I to judge who is deserving and who is not? That is a question for lords, not healers."

name: Mending Hands
oracle_text: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
flavor_text:
"I can staunch their blood, mend their flesh, and knit their bones. But I cannot restore their hope."
—Tender-Hand, kitsune healer

name: Moonlit Strider
oracle_text: Sacrifice Moonlit Strider: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Soulshift 3 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Opal-Eye, Konda's Yojimbo
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage this turn, that damage is dealt to Opal-Eye, Konda's Yojimbo instead.
{1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Opal-Eye this turn.

name: Oyobi, Who Split the Heavens
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, create a 3/3 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: Her angry call split the sky. From that rift descended her champions.

name: Patron of the Kitsune
oracle_text: Fox offering (You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Fox and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Fox. Mana cost includes color.)
Whenever a creature attacks, you may gain 1 life.

name: Scour
oracle_text: Exile target enchantment. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that enchantment and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

name: Shining Shoal
oracle_text: You may exile a white card with converted mana cost X from your hand rather than pay Shining Shoal's mana cost.
The next X damage that a source of your choice would deal to you and/or creatures you control this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.

name: Silverstorm Samurai
oracle_text: Flash
Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

name: Split-Tail Miko
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
flavor_text: "I wish there were no use for those with my talents. I wish that I could walk Kamigawa forgotten and unneeded, with no war wounds to heal and no broken bones to mend."

name: Takeno's Cavalry
oracle_text: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Takeno's Cavalry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking Spirit.
flavor_text: At night he perfected his aim, shooting spiderwebs by starlight.

name: Tallowisp
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may search your library for an Aura card with enchant creature, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Isolated on its little candlewick, the kami never heard of the crime that drove its comrades to war.

name: Terashi's Grasp
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor_text:
"The jeweler, the potter, the smith . . . They all imbue a bit of their souls into their creations. The kami destroy that crafted mortal shell and absorb the soul within."
—Noboru, master kitemaker

name: Terashi's Verdict
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text: It was as though the sky opened its eyes and found what it saw displeasing.

name: Ward of Piety
oracle_text: Enchant creature
{1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.
flavor_text: Reluctant to strike at the kami directly, some kitsune trained in more passive fighting techniques.

name: Waxmane Baku
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Waxmane Baku.
{1}, Remove X ki counters from Waxmane Baku: Tap X target creatures.

name: Yomiji, Who Bars the Way
oracle_text: Whenever a legendary permanent other than Yomiji, Who Bars the Way is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"As I died, I rejoiced. I would see my family again. But then I woke up back on the battlefield. Back in Kamigawa. Back in hell."
—Kenzo the Hardhearted

name: Callow Jushi
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Callow Jushi.
At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Callow Jushi, you may flip it.

name: Jaraku the Interloper
oracle_text: Remove a ki counter from Jaraku the Interloper: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

name: Chisei, Heart of Oceans
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Chisei, Heart of Oceans unless you remove a counter from a permanent you control.

name: Disrupting Shoal
oracle_text: You may exile a blue card with converted mana cost X from your hand rather than pay Disrupting Shoal's mana cost.
Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is X.

name: Floodbringer
oracle_text: Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Tap target land.
flavor_text: "Such a small thing, a drop of water . . . And yet enough of them together can flood a field, cleanse a mire, or choke a forest."

name: Genju of the Falls
oracle_text: Enchant Island
{2}: Enchanted Island becomes a 3/2 blue Spirit creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.
When enchanted Island is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Falls from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Heed the Mists
oracle_text: Put the top card of your library into your graveyard, then draw cards equal to that card's converted mana cost.
flavor_text: "Once, I looked to the mists for wisdom. Now I wish only for understanding."

name: Higure, the Still Wind
oracle_text: Ninjutsu {2}{U}{U} ({2}{U}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Higure, the Still Wind deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a Ninja card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
{2}: Target Ninja creature can't be blocked this turn.

name: Jetting Glasskite
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Jetting Glasskite becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability.
flavor_text: The bolt struck with a flash and there was a terrible sound, as of glass shattering, but the creature was unharmed.

name: Kaijin of the Vanishing Touch
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Kaijin of the Vanishing Touch blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)
flavor_text: When it's finished, all that's left of you is a ripple on a still pond.

name: Kira, Great Glass-Spinner
oracle_text: Flying
Creatures you control have "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability."
flavor_text: Each spell is an intricate tapestry, and Kira is the great unraveler.

name: Minamo Sightbender
oracle_text: {X}, {T}: Target creature with power X or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Woven from threads of the spirit world, the mistcloak rendered its wearer invisible, but quickly fell to tatters.

name: Minamo's Meddling
oracle_text: Counter target spell. That spell's controller reveals his or her hand, then discards each card with the same name as a card spliced onto that spell.
flavor_text: Like storm water through the segments of bamboo, the spell followed the links of magic. Then it destroyed them.

name: Mistblade Shinobi
oracle_text: Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Mistblade Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

name: Ninja of the Deep Hours
oracle_text: Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Ninja of the Deep Hours deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

name: Patron of the Moon
oracle_text: Moonfolk offering (You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Moonfolk and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Moonfolk. Mana cost includes color.)
Flying
{1}: Put up to two land cards from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

name: Phantom Wings
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Sacrifice Phantom Wings: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Many kami could fly, which put some warriors at a distinct disadvantage. The mages of Minamo took it upon themselves to correct that imbalance.

name: Quash
oracle_text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

name: Quillmane Baku
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Quillmane Baku.
{1}, {T}, Remove X ki counters from Quillmane Baku: Return target creature with converted mana cost X or less to its owner's hand.

name: Reduce to Dreams
oracle_text: Return all artifacts and enchantments to their owners' hands.
flavor_text:
"This world is a dream. We cling to our toys like children, but sooner or later we must learn to live without them."
—Sensei Hisoka

name: Ribbons of the Reikai
oracle_text: Draw a card for each Spirit you control.
flavor_text:
"If wisdom is a river, then we cup our hands, reach in, and drink from it in sips. The kami, however, are like fish, swimming, breathing, surrounded in its presence."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Shimmering Glasskite
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Shimmering Glasskite becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability.
flavor_text: A child's whisper could crack its shell, but not even an oni's scream could penetrate it.

name: Soratami Mindsweeper
oracle_text: Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

name: Stream of Consciousness
oracle_text: Target player shuffles up to four target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
flavor_text:
"All things return to their beginnings. The waters that spill across the Kamitaki Falls flow to sea, only to be returned to her as the rain that joins the mighty river."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

name: Sway of the Stars
oracle_text: Each player shuffles his or her hand, graveyard, and permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total becomes 7.

name: Teardrop Kami
oracle_text: Sacrifice Teardrop Kami: You may tap or untap target creature.
flavor_text:
"Do not fall into the trap of thinking you understand the kami. Cannot a drop of water be dew on the meadow, a glacier's thaw, or the tear of a child?"
—Sensei Hisoka

name: Threads of Disloyalty
oracle_text: Enchant creature with converted mana cost 2 or less
You control enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"Over time, Konda grew ever more suspicious, fearing even his most loyal allies were being manipulated by unseen hands."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Toils of Night and Day
oracle_text: You may tap or untap target permanent, then you may tap or untap another target permanent.
flavor_text:
"The war sent Kamigawa into turmoil. Here it was spring and there winter. For some, time stood still, while for others, moments flashed past like minnows in a pond."
—Observations of the Kami War

name: Tomorrow, Azami's Familiar
oracle_text: If you would draw a card, look at the top three cards of your library instead. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Veil of Secrecy
oracle_text: Target creature gains shroud until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. (A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

Splice onto Arcane—Return a blue creature you control to its owner's hand. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Walker of Secret Ways
oracle_text: Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Walker of Secret Ways deals combat damage to a player, look at that player's hand.
{1}{U}: Return target Ninja you control to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only during your turn.

name: Bile Urchin
oracle_text: Sacrifice Bile Urchin: Target player loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"The two youths argued and tempers flared. One youth opened his mouth to utter a vile curse, but what he spat out instead was a kami of poison and filth."
—Sensei Golden-Tail

name: Blessing of Leeches
oracle_text: Flash
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.
{0}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

name: Call for Blood
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Call for Blood, sacrifice a creature.
Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

name: Crawling Filth
oracle_text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Soulshift 5 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Eradicate
oracle_text: Exile target nonblack creature. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that creature and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

name: Genju of the Fens
oracle_text: Enchant Swamp
{2}: Until end of turn, enchanted Swamp becomes a 2/2 black Spirit creature with "{B}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn." It's still a land.
When enchanted Swamp is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Fens from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Goryo's Vengeance
oracle_text: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
Splice onto Arcane {2}{B} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Hero's Demise
oracle_text: Destroy target legendary creature.
flavor_text:
"What will it say on our graves, Lord Konda? Will it say we led our world to conquer immortal forces or that we were crushed by our own arrogance? At each defeat, I wonder."
—Sensei Hisoka, letter to Lord Konda

name: Hired Muscle
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Hired Muscle.
At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Hired Muscle, you may flip it.

name: Scarmaker

name: Horobi's Whisper
oracle_text: If you control a Swamp, destroy target nonblack creature.

Splice onto Arcane—Exile four cards from your graveyard. (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

name: Ink-Eyes, Servant of Oni
oracle_text: Ninjutsu {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Ink-Eyes, Servant of Oni deals combat damage to a player, you may put target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Ink-Eyes.

name: Kyoki, Sanity's Eclipse
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, target opponent exiles a card from his or her hand.
flavor_text:
"Kyoki, Eater of Minds, Corrupter of Thoughts, Bringer of Madness, Lord of Fear. Return, by our blood, and walk again."
—Ogre chant

name: Mark of the Oni
oracle_text: Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
At the beginning of the end step, if you control no Demons, sacrifice Mark of the Oni.
flavor_text:
"As more oni walked Kamigawa, more darkness infested its inhabitants' souls."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Nezumi Shadow-Watcher
oracle_text: Sacrifice Nezumi Shadow-Watcher: Destroy target Ninja.
flavor_text:
"The Okiba Gang! Night-cursed thieves and assassins! I've had enough of their meddling! Triple the guard!"
—Marrow-Gnawer

name: Ogre Marauder
oracle_text: Whenever Ogre Marauder attacks, it gains "Ogre Marauder can't be blocked" until end of turn unless defending player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Once freed, the oni demanded more and more sacrifices to appease them. The ogres happily obliged.

name: Okiba-Gang Shinobi
oracle_text: Ninjutsu {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Okiba-Gang Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards.

name: Patron of the Nezumi
oracle_text: Rat offering (You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a Rat and paying the difference in mana costs between this and the sacrificed Rat. Mana cost includes color.)
Whenever a permanent is put into an opponent's graveyard, that player loses 1 life.

name: Psychic Spear
oracle_text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a Spirit or Arcane card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"The wizards of Takenuma Swamp faced the horrors of humanity every day. It's no wonder they fared so well against the kami."
—Observations of the Kami War

name: Pus Kami
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice Pus Kami: Destroy target nonblack creature.
Soulshift 6 (When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 6 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

name: Scourge of Numai
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life if you don't control an Ogre.
flavor_text:
"Where a once-proud human city stood, only the ruins of Numai remain, deep amid rotting bamboo and plagued by oni."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Shirei, Shizo's Caretaker
oracle_text: Whenever a creature with power 1 or less is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step if Shirei, Shizo's Caretaker is still on the battlefield.

name: Sickening Shoal
oracle_text: You may exile a black card with converted mana cost X from your hand rather than pay Sickening Shoal's mana cost.
Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

name: Skullmane Baku
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Skullmane Baku.
{1}, {T}, Remove X ki counters from Skullmane Baku: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

name: Skullsnatcher
oracle_text: Ninjutsu {B} ({B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Skullsnatcher deals combat damage to a player, exile up to two target cards from that player's graveyard.

name: Stir the Grave
oracle_text: Return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Your lungs may not draw breath, but while your hands can grip a sword, you will be useful to me."
—Nighteyes, nezumi necromancer

name: Takenuma Bleeder
oracle_text: Whenever Takenuma Bleeder attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life if you don't control a Demon.
flavor_text: "I prefer to weave my magic through oni blood, but yours will do in a pinch."

name: Three Tragedies
oracle_text: Target player discards three cards.
flavor_text:
"As the kami passed over the village of Mita, the inhabitants relived their three most grievous tragedies. Some cried. Some raged. Some were driven to madness. But the next morning, none possessed the will to fight."
—Observations of the Kami War

name: Throat Slitter
oracle_text: Ninjutsu {2}{B} ({2}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Throat Slitter deals combat damage to a player, destroy target nonblack creature that player controls.

name: Toshiro Umezawa
oracle_text: Bushido 1 (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

name: Yukora, the Prisoner
oracle_text: When Yukora, the Prisoner leaves the battlefield, sacrifice all non-Ogre creatures you control.
flavor_text: It took ninety-nine monks to weave the spell that trapped Yukora. Upon the death of the ninety-nine, the spell was broken, and the demon returned to the mortal world seeking vengeance for its imprisonment.

name: Akki Blizzard-Herder
oracle_text: When Akki Blizzard-Herder dies, each player sacrifices a land.
flavor_text:
"It remains unclear whether the akki shamans could in fact create storms or simply predicted them."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Akki Raider
oracle_text: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Akki Raider gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Akki were very territorial, attacking and destroying any settlements that came too close to their mountain homes. The more successful their raids, the bolder they became.

name: Ashen Monstrosity
oracle_text: Haste
Ashen Monstrosity attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: There was a dull thunder at the vanguard, then shocked cries in the midst of the column. Moments later, Takada, last of the rearguard, faced the kami alone.

name: Aura Barbs
oracle_text: Each enchantment deals 2 damage to its controller, then each Aura attached to a creature deals 2 damage to the creature it's attached to.

name: Blademane Baku
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Blademane Baku.
{1}, Remove X ki counters from Blademane Baku: For each counter removed, Blademane Baku gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Blazing Shoal
oracle_text: You may exile a red card with converted mana cost X from your hand rather than pay Blazing Shoal's mana cost.
Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

name: Clash of Realities
oracle_text: All Spirits have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may have it deal 3 damage to target non-Spirit creature."
Non-Spirit creatures have "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may have it deal 3 damage to target Spirit creature."

name: Crack the Earth
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices a permanent.
flavor_text:
"As the war progressed, the destruction the kami caused became more widespread and less predictable."
—Observations of the Kami War

name: Cunning Bandit
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Cunning Bandit.
At the beginning of the end step, if there are two or more ki counters on Cunning Bandit, you may flip it.

name: Azamuki, Treachery Incarnate
oracle_text: Remove a ki counter from Azamuki, Treachery Incarnate: Gain control of target creature until end of turn.

name: First Volley
oracle_text: First Volley deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text:
"We searched their bodies for signs of the blades that had killed them, but found nothing more than scorched flesh."
—Tender-Hand, kitsune healer

name: Flames of the Blood Hand
oracle_text: Flames of the Blood Hand deals 4 damage to target player. The damage can't be prevented. If that player would gain life this turn, that player gains no life instead.
flavor_text: Many ogres extracted blood oaths from the oni they summoned. Others simply extracted blood.

name: Frost Ogre
flavor_text: Mountain ogres allowed blizzards to sheathe them in ice, both to reinforce their armor and to hide their pungent musk from potential prey.

name: Frostling
oracle_text: Sacrifice Frostling: Frostling deals 1 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: Its bite will take off more than a toe.

name: Fumiko the Lowblood
oracle_text: Fumiko the Lowblood has bushido X, where X is the number of attacking creatures. (Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +X/+X until end of turn.)
Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.

name: Genju of the Spires
oracle_text: Enchant Mountain
{2}: Enchanted Mountain becomes a 6/1 red Spirit creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
When enchanted Mountain is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Spires from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Goblin Cohort
oracle_text: Goblin Cohort can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.
flavor_text: Akki shells provided good protection when downhill charging became headlong tumbling.

name: Heartless Hidetsugu
oracle_text: {T}: Heartless Hidetsugu deals damage to each player equal to half that player's life total, rounded down.
flavor_text: Hidetsugu held over a dozen oni in blood oath. At his touch, rocks scorched. At his word, cities burned.

name: In the Web of War
oracle_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"In desperation, Konda sent warriors to parley with the ogre-magi. No one knows whether they were slaughtered at Shinka or if they even reached its bloodstained walls."
—Observations of the Kami War

name: Ire of Kaminari
oracle_text: Ire of Kaminari deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of Arcane cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Thunder broke the brittle silence over the Araba. A surge of raw energy lifted the soldier's body into the air and briefly, in the heart of the flash, he saw the face of a god."
—Great Battles of Kamigawa

name: Ishi-Ishi, Akki Crackshot
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a Spirit or Arcane spell, Ishi-Ishi, Akki Crackshot deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor_text:
"Here fell Ishi-Ishi, King of the Flaming Pebbles, Scourge of the Mountain Kami, Lover of Goats. May his shell never burn."
—Cave inscription

name: Kumano's Blessing
oracle_text: Flash

name: Mannichi, the Fevered Dream
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Switch each creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Early in his reign, Konda fell ill. His head burned with fever, and he saw visions of his future. In them, he saw a spirit-child, and, in that child's eyes, a way to make his empire last forever."
—The History of Kamigawa

name: Ogre Recluse
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, tap Ogre Recluse.
flavor_text:
"Those ogres who did not embrace oni worship were cast out, cursed, and forced into hermitage, waiting for the day the oni would come for them."
—The History of Kamigawa
